name: Material science world forum
content: Materials Science World Forum, organized by Continuum Forums, will focus on relevant, useful and current scientific research outcomes in this exciting and promising field to enrich the participants with the knowledge aimed at further enhancing ongoing research in materials science for better outcomes for the worldwide community. The meeting will be held during November 04-06, 2021 in Edinburgh, Scotland and anticipates the participation of worldwide professionals in materials research to present innovative ideas on different issues related to materials science. The theme of the conference “Celebrating the Highest Quality Research and Practice in Materials Science” will focus on sharing the most recent evidence-based research.
